# valueSelectionBehavior

**Instance Property**

The current selection behavior.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var valueSelectionBehavior: ABPeoplePickerSelectionBehavior { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default behavior is [doc://com.apple.addressbook/documentation/AddressBook/ABSingleValueSelection].

## Specifying Selection Behavior

- **ABPeoplePickerSelectionBehavior**: Constants indicating the possible value selection behaviors.
